text: Hanki ana vahe'ma kegava huzmante'za zamavare'za e'naza kva vahe'mokizimi zamagia, Zerubabeliki, Jesuaki, Nehemaiaki, Azariaki, Ra'amiaki, Nahamaniki, Modekaiaki, Bilsaniki, Misperetiki, Bigvaiki, Nehumuki, Ba'anaki hu'za e'naze. Hagi kvama krizmante'za zamavare'za e'naza Israeli vahe'mokizmi zamagi'a ama'ne,
